sentence.Network_en: Some ants eject formic acid when irritated.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些蚂蚁受到刺激时会排出蚁酸.

sentence.Network_en: Many other insects also produce formic as well as other kinds of acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他多种昆虫也能制造甲酸或其他种类的酸.

sentence.Network_en: Production 1,2 hydroxy beta 4 - formic acid, a beta consignment sales produced products.
sentence.Network_cn: 生产1、4-二羟基萘甲酸 、 甲萘醌,销售自产产品.
